attributes.title: Rock n' Roll Funhaus Saves the Bees International Telethon for the Bees: Rock n' Roll!
attributes.caption: "Can I eat your poop?"
attributes.description:
Get your RTX badge at http://bit.ly/rtxaustin22



Ah, who could forget the classic "Lovable Bespectacled Child Dies of Anaphylaxis" movie era of the early 90s. It was a refreshing change from all the body swapping silliness of the 80s.



Follow us on Twitter!

attributes.title: Revenge of the Smiff - Funhaus Public Broadcasting
attributes.caption: "Someone had to take the fall for my scabies."
attributes.description:
Go to http://everyplate.com and use code funhaus179 to get EveryPlate for just $1.79 per meal.



My wife told me she caught Infidelity from a toilet seat back in '08 and just can't seem to shake it; no matter how many Applebee's bartenders she bangs.

attributes.title: Last Hand Standing - 1st Annual Funhaus Typing Competition!
attributes.caption: "Type 'WEED' every day!"
attributes.description:
Go to http://fahertybrand.com/funhaus and use code FUNHAUS to get

20% off.



Please be patient with Ryan. He broke his other four fingers in a freak belt-tightening accident. That day he vowed: Never again.

attributes.title: Is It Cake, or Something Far More Sinister? - Funhaus Public Broadcasting
attributes.caption: "Dick never tasted so good."
attributes.description:
Go to http://shopify.com/funhaus to get a free 14-day trial.

Check out 30 Morbid Minutes and Ship Hits the Fan wherever you get your podcasts!



For a whole year I thought I had a gluten intolerance, but then my gastroenterologist told me I just REALLY liked being a burden to others when dining out.

attributes.title: Shots 4 Bats - Funhaus Halloween Drunk Stream
attributes.caption: "It’s front guano!"
attributes.description:
One of our former interns made the mistake of reading aloud a passage in Ryan's Book of Lore. Now she spends her days in a padded cell, humming Dead Milkmen songs and scribbling Jim Varney quotes on the walls with her poop.

attributes.title: Finally, A Game Show About Gaming for Gamers!
attributes.caption: "Are your teeth sweating?"
attributes.description:
Go to http://buyraycon.com/funhaus and use code EARLYBF to get 20% off sitewide!



Back in the golden age of Nickelodeon game shows you could win yourself a trip to space camp with nothing more than a little determination and the willingness to get ringworm from a kiddie pool full of fake mashed potatoes.



Check out more of Zach here: https://twitter.com/zachanner
